title: My friend got hacked, or a weird bug.
body:
Can someone help explain this.

http://imgur.com/jcNGNAZ

http://imgur.com/yXLRkCe

Suddenly I got this joined the club room.
But I've never seen that name before, but no one added anyone in.
I asked a friend if he changed his name as on messenger his name was suddenly different.
He said no and changed his password.

replies.body:
Well Riot finally fixed it today, reversed all the hacker's actions. Not without some mishaps though, I had to send them an additional email about the correct IP Balance and they surprisingly followed up in less than an hour.

Wait........... the boards are still not fully refreshed, still says Laur404 in places.
Edit: everything refreshed after I posted this. Weird stuff, I had these issues with the support ticket and client as well, the hacked name would still be lingering.

Well I'm glad everything is all good and sorted out.
Hackers are scary as hell.
Hey Yasei, did you not have timestamps on these chat messages?
I always like to keep timestamps on.

Yes, my account did get hacked. I found out I owned 60 champions, when before I swore I owned 63. I went to Store Purchase History and the hacker had used all my refund credits to get enough IP to buy the summoner name change. Submitting ticket to Riot.

I was not logged into client at the time, only via LoL Friends.

Hey there,

If you currently have a support ticket open you'll just have to wait out the investigation into your account, everything will be reversed if the account is found to have been compromised.

In the meantime I would recommend ensuring your system is secure;

* Do you currently have an antivirus installed? (If not I recommend [Malwarebytes](https://www.malwarebytes.org/))
  * If you do, please ensure it is fully updated and run a full system scan.

I'd also recommend changing your password to your email/any other accounts that may be compromised to prevent any further issues.

Yep, Riot sent the standard response of please answer these questions:
> The original email address used to register the account:
List of locations that you have played on this account (City and Country):
Your current IP address(http://whatsmyip.net/)
First five champions ever purchased on this account:
First item ever purchased with RP (if applicable):
List of payment methods used to purchase RP:
Who made this account?
Any other people (including family members/friends) that have ever had access to the account:

I've replied with the most detailed answers I could, and am waiting for a response.

Also in the process of Full System Scanning all computers I use for LoL with Norton and Malwarebytes. I can't really play LoL on this account until it has been resolved.
